meaning_str.bing:
n. 建筑；建筑物；楼房；房子
v. “build”的现在分词

建筑物；建筑；构筑物；大楼；房屋；楼房；设施；建筑业；建筑活动；建筑过程
建造；构建；发展；开发；创建；（build的现在分词）

sogou-CET6.n: 建筑物; 房屋[出现49次)];建筑; 建造过程[出现2次)];形成[出现1次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 建筑物; 房屋[出现31次)];建筑; 建造过程[出现7次)];形成[出现6次)]

sogou-gaokao.n: 建筑物; 房屋[出现16次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 建筑物[出现87次)];建筑; 发展[出现5次)]

1.en: I said, no building; there was a cave on the site, we tunnel into the hill, descend through the rock into an underground chamber.
1.cn: 我说，不要建筑；因为那里有个洞穴，我们挖隧道进去，顺着岩石一直到地下的展室。

2.en: In larger companies, it's easy to slip into the bad habit of building in too much code to handle future requirements.
2.cn: 在大公司里，很容易陷入构建太多代码来处理未来需求的坏习惯。

3.en: Think about that when you see that building, that sometimes the things we strive for so hard in life, we never get to see finished.
3.cn: 当你看到这大楼的时候，想像一下我们为它倾尽毕生的心血，却不能目睹它的完成。

0.en: No way. I know everything about this building. Or used to. You know the sycamores on the other side of the building?
0.cn: 不可能吧，我对这幢建筑了如指掌，至少以前是，你知道这房子右边的梧桐吗？

1.en: It was a beautiful building and I was wandering around, looking at it, looking for the women's room, when a staff member informed me very firmly that the ladies' room was over there, and I should be sure not to go up stairs because women are never allowed in this building.
1.cn: 建筑很漂亮 我在里面游荡。欣赏它，找女卫生间。结果一位员工很肯定地告诉我，女卫生间在那里，我务必不要上楼去。因为女性不允许进入这座建筑。

2.en: It's when you're out here, only an hour from the world's tallest building, that you'll truly appreciate just how miraculous Dubai is.
2.cn: 当您身处沙漠，距离全球最高的建筑只有一小时路程，您会深深感受到迪拜的不可思议。

3.en: But this icy river isn't just for extreme sports. All the building materials for the festival at Harbin are taken from this spot to create the city of ice.
3.cn: 除了极限运动外，这条冰河还有其它用处，哈尔滨冰雪节的所有建筑材料都从这里取用，冰城由此而来。

4.en: The first person I ever met who shares the name with a whole building. Or so I met when the first classmate I met was Sarah Wigglesworth, who bore no relation at all to the dorm, which would have been nice to know with that very intimidating moment.
4.cn: 我还碰到了第一个名字同整座建筑一样的人。这个人的名字叫作莎拉·威格尔斯沃思。她同那栋宿舍楼没有任何关系。当时我很震惊，知道没关系后我才舒了一口气。

5.en: This is the first building I ever bought.
5.cn: 这是我买下的第一栋楼。

6.cn: 但是没有约翰逊参议院大楼。

7.en: Evacuate the building and maybe you'll live.
7.cn: 从里面出来，没准你们还能活下来。

8.en: And that's the Chrysler Building right there.
8.cn: 克莱斯勒大楼就在那儿。

9.en: Now they are building their own space station.
9.cn: 而如今，他们正在建立他们自己的空间站。

10.en: She really has a building? With her name on it.
10.cn: 她真有一栋大厦啊？还是以她的名字命名的。

11.en: What are these? Electrical plans for the building.
11.cn: 这是什么？这栋楼的电路图。

12.en: In three minutes, this building will be demolished.
12.cn: 三分钟后，这座大楼就会坍塌。

13.en: Why not tell people? Why keep building those stations?
13.cn: 为什么不说出来？为什么还要建那些空间站？

14.en: Maybe she was planning on taking out the whole building.
14.cn: 她也许是想拿下整栋楼呢。

15.en: You changed the address on the building? What about mail?
15.cn: 你把门牌号给改了？信件怎么办？

16.en: It's Finn Polmar coming out of your wife's apartment building.
16.cn: 芬恩·波尔马，正从你妻子的公寓大楼走出来。

17.en: And everyone else; painting, clay or building-blocks? Building-Blocks. My goodness. Building-blocks are popular today.
17.cn: 那么其他人呢？画画，捏泥人，还是搭积木呢？搭积木！我的天啊。看来今天搭积木很受欢迎！

18.en: The 1200 building is Medley Industrial and Sanko Oil. The building across the street is Lee-Ray Shipping.
18.cn: 正前方的是曼尼工业和新科石油，对街是里瑞运输。

19.en: Today isn't just about building a duck village. It's about building your smile. Don't fight it. There it is.
19.cn: 今天我们不只是建造一个鸭子村而已，更是要让你学会微笑，别抗拒，终于笑了。
